Details.description: Server providing data for the ready-salted app.

GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of all available endpoints

GET /api/users.queries: ?p=num in order to navigate pagination of served users
GET /api/users.description: Serves an array containing the details of all users, with password fields ommitted

GET /api/users/username.accepts: username property to match with a document
GET /api/users/username.description: Serves a single user's details omitting password

POST /api/users/:username/password.accepts: username property to reference a document in users collection, password on request body in format {password:'your password here'}
POST /api/users/:username/password.description: Performs comparison between password on request body and password stored in corresponding document in users collection
POST /api/users/:username/password.notes: Password security implemented, still using POST request

GET /api/users/scores.queries: ?p=num in order to navigate pagination of served scores
GET /api/users/scores.description: Serves a list of all scores in descending order attached to documents in the user collection

POST /api/users.accepts: user details on request body, should contain username, email, password fields inside object
POST /api/users.description: Accepts a json on request body and adds this as a new document on the users collection

DELETE /api/users/:username.accepts: username property to reference a document in users collection
DELETE /api/users/:username.description: Deletes a document from users collection with corresponding username

PATCH /api/users/:username.accepts: username property to reference a document in users collection, properties to update on request body, in format {propertyToUpdate:newValue}
PATCH /api/users/:username.description: Updates fields on a document from users collection with the contents of the request body
